title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Earn 1,000 Marriott points by linking your Uber account and taking a premium ride
items.description: Through Nov. 24, you can earn 1,000 Marriott points and be entered for a chance to win 1 million Bonvoy points. Simply link your Uber account and comp...

items.title: Sonder to file bankruptcy — here's what to do if you booked a stay through Marriott
items.description: Shortly after Marriott announced the termination of its licensing agreement with Sonder Hotels, Sonder has declared bankruptcy.

items.title: ‘Real disruption’ for flights is yet to come if shutdown continues, DOT says
items.description: The Trump administration warned that travelers could face even worse delays and cancellations if Congress can't end the government shutdown this week.

items.title: Prime Visa card review: A must-have for Prime members
